thread.title: Gov. Dannel Malloy Offers Plan To Ease Connecticut Tax Burden

author: Joseph De Avila
title: Gov. Dannel Malloy Offers Plan To Ease Connecticut Tax Burden
text:
Gov. Dannel Malloy on Monday proposed legislation to help Connecticut residents make up for $10 billion in lost federal tax deductions under the recent tax overhaul.
His plan aims to assist Connecticut homeowners who face higher federal tax bills because the new law caps state and local tax deductions at $10,000 a year. To get around that cap, Mr. Malloyâ€™s proposal would give towns authority to form charitable organizations that residents can contribute to in exchange for property tax credits.
